description: Try our easy to follow Thai Prawn Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Prawn Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the prawns and simmer for 35 minutes until they are pink and cooked through. Stir in the lime juice and fresh coriander and serve.
